Literature.Title: Chemerin is an antimicrobial agent in human epidermis.
Literature.Author: Banas M, Zabieglo K, Kasetty G, Kapinska-Mrowiecka M, Borowczyk J, Drukala J, Murzyn K, Zabel BA, Butcher EC, Schroeder JM, Schmidtchen A, Cichy J

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 11775(MIC=3.1-6.3µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 10145(MIC=6.3µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 24433(MIC=6.3µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 14990(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Escherichia coli JM83(LC=10µM),Escherichia coli JM83(LC50=10µM),Escherichia coli JM83(LC50=10µM)
